# Bayesian Works

The bayesian paradigm is revolutionary because of how it differs from the frequentist paradigm such that it readily accepts change, where your prior belief in the probability of an event occuring may be modified according to how often the event actually occurs, and how well it maintains this newly-found probability, or posterior.
